attributes.action: ...establish a state run bank with a fair and reflective scale of charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The media has reported today that banks, not content with making billions of pounds each year, are planning to cease free banking.

Add to this that many people rely on bank accounts for receiving pensions, benefits, etc I believe that it is teh responsibility of the government to establish a 'basic' style bank account for people to use instead of funding corporate fat cats lavish lifestyles through the High Street banks.
